detail_desc: Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pocket and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved sports top in patterned, fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with ventilating mesh side panels. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Satin-covered Alice band with a glittery Christmas tree on the top.
Bucket bag in grained imitation leather with a drawstring at the top, a handle and a detachable shoulder strap with metal carabiner hooks. Size 19x27x33 cm.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Treggings in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric, one pair with an all-over print. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Ankle-length jeggings in stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with raw-edge hems.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Long chiffon dress with a lace bodice, wide neckline and short cap sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with a decorative grosgrain band that ties at the back and a softly draping, pleated skirt. Lined.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Fine-knit sports socks with a ribbed shaft. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.
Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a pleated weave with a double flounce at the top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Satin lining.
Knee-length dress with cap sleeves, a round neckline, zip at the back and skirt with box pleats.
Dungarees in washed, stretch denim with adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets and slim legs.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and decorative bar-shaped bead at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut hem.
Low-necked blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Buttons down the front and 3/4-length puff sleeves with inset lace trims and narrow elastication and ties at the cuffs.
Short dress in softly draping jersey. Narrow cut with draping and an opening at the top, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, and wide straps at the back. Lined.
Jersey body in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck and decorative gathers at the bust, narrow shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, polarised lenses.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in soft, patterned viscose jersey. High waist with concealed elastication and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and slim legs.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length leggings in stretch, lightweight denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and slits at the hems.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with a ribbed, frill-trimmed polo neck, long sleeves with decorative gathers at the shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative frill over the shoulders.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Hats in soft, organic cotton jersey with a foldover hem. One ribbed and one with an all-over print.
Bandeau bra in soft stretch fabric with a hole pattern at the front and detachable, adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners. Seamless.

Platform shoes in imitation patent leather with closed lacing at the front and a decorative welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform front approx 3 cm, heel approx 5.5 cm.
Short off-the-shoulder dress in a patterned weave with elastication at the top, a smocked bodice and short sleeves.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a square neckline front and back. Short, voluminous puff sleeves in a viscose and cotton weave with narrow elastication at the hems and shoulders.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a scallop-edged V-neck, decorative buttons at the front, short sleeves and a flared skirt.

Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and zipped front pockets for safe storage of valuables. Extra-long sleeves with thumbholes to help keep you warm while exercising outside. The sleeves are in a raglan cut to minimise the risk of friction from the seams.
Pre-tied tie in woven fabric with a shimmering pattern. Adjustable elastic strap with a plastic fastener at the back.
Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with a square, scallop-edged neckline front and back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a scalloped edge at the hem. Partly lined.

Track jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long sleeves with gathered seams and thumbholes at the cuffs, and discreet side pockets with a zip. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Oversized jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a stand-up collar and low dropped shoulders.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Joggers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, a back pocket and elasticated hems.
Mittens in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with decorative bows on the front.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Regular waist with a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a V-neck front and back.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a yoke at the back and a rounded hem.

prod_name: TP BOSSE fancy OH hood SB
detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool decorated with pearly plastic beads at the top. Long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Treggings in stretch corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in washed, lightweight cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Large flap chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, a seam centre back and raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.

Trainers in mesh, imitation leather and imitation suede with raised details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Short, fitted top in printed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Fully lined bikini with an all-over print. Top with two flounces at the front and narrow shoulder straps, one with a small metal pendant.
Oversized, straight-style top in a fine knit with a collar, V-neck, dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem.

Super push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Wide fit, longer at the back.

Jumpsuit in soft viscose with a round neckline, gently gathered yoke at the front, press-studs on one shoulder and short butterfly sleeves. Elasticated waist with a decorative bow at the front, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Set with a waistcoat, pair of shorts and matching shirt in a cotton weave and a pre-tied bow tie in a linen and cotton weave. Lined waistcoat with buttons at the front. Knee-length shorts with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and fake diagonal side pockets. Shirt with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and a plastic fastener at the back.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature. The top has a round neck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Thong briefs, one pair in microfibre and one in lace. Both pairs have a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Waist-high briefs in supersoft, stretch jersey that moulds to the body – one size fits all. Folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. Lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Microfibre leggings with elastication at the waist and hems.
